banti kohomath kamathi ee wage ganu daruwonta thamayi..

ihatha sandahan kala sema ‘wikalpa’ web adawiye patakayanta menma podu janayatath wiwruthawa thabena mema pradarshanayedi obata 2009 sita 2017 dakwa shri lankawa thula sidu wu ha sidu kala athurudanwim, idam athpathkara ganim, abhyanthara awathan wuwan, madhya mardanaya, jathinta erehi hinsanaya athulu kota wu pashchath yuda shri lankawe suwisheshi thaththwayan chayarupa osse dakaganimata hakiwe.

kathru: hem kumar agarwal (nasim kaji) pariwarthanaya: ke. em. napawala sakas kirima: es. em. mansur ”dasa masak kusa howa ma bihi kala mage panatath wada aadaraya karana mage amma wa, mage ma das idiripita di bura bara nagena apa ginnen dawenu dakimata mama kisiseth pa්riya nokarami.

rajaya samaga ekwannenam mudal labadimata sudanam bawata nawa rajaye prabalayin kihipadeneku thamanta labadun durakathana amathumwalata adala thawath hadapata kihipayakda idiriyedi madhyawetha idiripath karana bawayi palitha range bandara mahatha ada pawathi madhya hamuwedi sadahan kale.
yana upa hedima yatathe
me lipiya ehema pro ayata nam nemeyi.
bahiraye arajikathwaya gana katha karanawata wada api wisin eliyata pa්rakshepanaya karamin inna ape pawathmen windawana arajikathwaya eya sakachcha meseta genawa.

ebawin ratakata me parikshana pawathwima wadagathya.me wanawita bahujathika samagam madhya wetha prawruththi niwedana nikuth karamin rasayanika drawya nathayi pawasana athara in ehata gos saukhya niladharin athulu thawath ayata eeta wada balapam athiwiya haki bawin eewata yata nowi daruwan ha janathawa wenuwen katayuthu karannayi niladharin gen saukhya sewa wruththiya samithi sandhanaya illa sitiyi. .
anadimath kalayaka sita hudekalawa wisu lankawe janathawa palanaya wuweda hudekala palanayakata nathuwaya.
hitiyath inne karu jayasuriya wannawun.
gath naya aapasu labena thek iwasa sitiya misa kisi witekath nayakaruwan soya gos owun wa wehesata path kele natha.
dan aluthen pirisak ahanna patan gana thiyanawa, hama dakatama rabi ratawalwala prasana lankawe muslim minissu uda danna.
"anna balanna me sahodaraya awasanaye di mage sthawaraya piligaththa hati" wamanshika kukula ka gasiya.
kalubowila dakunu kolambaa shikshana rohale adhikarana waidya niladhariwarun wana sampath senathunga saha es.
man hithanne chals dayas ge nagamaka aa ekak.

‘tharaga diwuma’ yanu amerika eksath janapadaya pura siyalu pa්ranthawala ee wanawita sitina adala pakshaye mahajana niyojithayange kamaththa labaganime tharagayayi. 2008 janadhipathiwaranayata pera dimoka්ratik pakshaye tharaga diwumata barak obama saha hilari klintan sahabhagi wu ayuru apata thawama mathaka ya.

‘‘’rajya nowana sanwidhanawalata awashya ayurin aandu kirimata thaman sudanam nathayi, ema sanwidhana kiyana ayurin hamudawata chodana pathra dimata thaman sudanam nathayi ki janadhipathiwaraya, hamudawata, polisiyata wiruddhawa mona chodana aawath eewa prathikshepa kara owun aaraksha kirimata katayuthu karana bawa” prakasha kaleya.
